page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content:
The{Church of England}has Churches at Barkisland and Norland. Christ Church, Barkisland, is part of a group of Parishes which serve Ripponden, Rishworth, Barkisland and Deanhead. St Lukes Church at Norland comes within the Parish of Sowerby. There is a{Methodist}Chapel at Triangle.
There is a{C.E.(Aided) Primary School} at Barkisland, and{C.E.(Controlled)} {Schools}at Triangle and Norland.The Church has great influence at Barkisland School as half of the Governing Body is appointed by the Parochial Church Council and the Wakefield Diocesan Education Committee.
